articles.content: The dominance of the coquette aesthetic is not going anywhere any time soon. Most recently, it was Janhvi Kapoor and her stunning sartorial sensibilities that made a case for the same. Her latest loo… [+1515 chars]

articles.title: Sanjay Dutt posts throwback pictures of mother Nargis on her 43rd death anniversary | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: On the work front, Sanjay will next be seen in 'KD - The Devil' directed by Prem, starring Dhruva Sarja.
articles.content: On the 43rd death anniversary of Nargis Dutt, actor Sanjay Dutt fondly remembered his mother, expressing that she remains close to his heart and cherished memories. Sanjay took to Instagram on Friday… [+731 chars]
